about_the_game:
Create your character and explore a procedurally generated fantasy world. Gather resources to build anything you want, or craft any weapon, armor, or tool you can think of just by placing blocks together! Explore increasingly difficult regions, fight monsters and bosses, clear dungeons, and level up your own way by designing your own spells and skills! The way you design your character and story is limitless.

Craft anything you can imagine!

Explore a fantasy procedurally generated world!

Worlds are fully procedural, giving you a new experience every time you create a new world!

Gather resources and build anything you want!

Gather resources and modify the terrain!

Design Your Own Spells & Weapon Abilities!

Level up and spend your XP to design your own spells and weapon abilities!

Character Customization!

Choose a race to play as and customize how your character looks!

Endless Progression!

There is no level cap, so grow as powerful as you want!

Action Combat!

Aim, dodge, and block attacks!

The Farther You Travel, The Harder Things Get...

Farther regions are riskier, but more rewarding!

Multiplayer Support!

Start up your own server and play with your friends!

short_description: Design your own weapons, armor, and spells to defeat increasingly difficult enemies in this procedurally generated voxel RPG with your friends. Clear dungeons, gather resources, build bases, tame monsters, catch fish, and grow crops!
